content.question: Scholars believe that the sculpture of Apollo from the Temple of Minerva at Veii served as a

choices.label: votive statue buried as an offering to the Etruscan gods
part of group of figures depicting a mythological narrative
cult statue to be placed in the inner sanctuary of the temple
reliquary figure containing the remains of a venerated individual

content.answer: part of group of figures depicting a mythological narrative

topic.text: 2.4: Theories and Interpretations of Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 7.A: Describe one or more art historically relevant interpretations of a work of art (or group of related works of art), its reception, or its meaning.
